page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA
page.content: I get up in the morning at about 7.30 a.m. I usually have toast and a cup of coffee for my breakfast. Afterwards I have a wash and get dressed. I set off for school at 8.20 and sometimes go to the shop on the way for some sweets. I arrive at school at 8.35 where I meet my friends. We usually talk or play skipping until the bell goes at 9.55. After Assembly we usually have Mathematics and then English. At playtime I get a bag of crisps from the school shop. In the summer we can go on the school field to play so we bring our own things to have a game of rounders. You are not allowed to play ball games in the playground because it is too dangerous. I stay at school for my dinner. Today we had chips, beans and sausage followed by sponge pudding.
